name: Burn Away
text: Burn Away deals 6 damage to target creature. When that creature dies this turn, exile all cards from its controller's graveyard.

editions.flavor:
"Your corruption will burn, serpent, until there is nothing left to defile."
—Asmala, bloodfire mystic

"Your corruption will burn, serpent, until there is nothing left to defile."
—Asmala, bloodfire mystic

name: Burn from Within
text: Burn from Within deals X damage to target creature or player. If a creature is dealt damage this way, it loses indestructible until end of turn. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

name: Burning Anger
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals damage equal to its power to target creature or player."

editions.flavor: "With rage as your forge, your hammer can smite anything."

name: Burning Cinder Fury of Crimson Chaos Fire
text:
Whenever any player taps a card, that player gives control of that card to an opponent at end of turn.
If a player does not tap any nonland cards during his or her turn, Burning Cinder Fury of Crimson Chaos Fire deals 3 damage to that player at end of turn.

name: Burning Cloak
text: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Burning Cloak deals 2 damage to that creature.

name: Burning Earth
text: Whenever a player taps a nonbasic land for mana, Burning Earth deals 1 damage to that player.

editions.flavor:
"Your world is formed from the same power that wraps my burning hand around your throat."
—Shrazik, lavamancer

name: Burning-Eye Zubera
text: When Burning-Eye Zubera dies, if 4 or more damage was dealt to it this turn, Burning-Eye Zubera deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

name: Burning Fields
text: Burning Fields deals 5 damage to target opponent.

editions.flavor:
"In raiding and plundering, be like fire, in immovability like a mountain."
—Sun Tzu, Art of War (trans. Giles)

name: Burning Inquiry
text: Each player draws three cards, then discards three cards at random.

editions.flavor: Jariad burned the midnight oil, burned through scroll after scroll, and then burned down his laboratory.

name: Burning of Xinye
text: You destroy four lands you control, then target opponent destroys four lands he or she controls. Then Burning of Xinye deals 4 damage to each creature.

name: Burning Oil
text:
Burning Oil deals 3 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
Flashback {3}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

editions.flavor: Every now and then, a devil's prank can give you a good idea.

name: Burning Palm Efreet
text: {1}{R}{R}: Burning Palm Efreet deals 2 damage to target creature with flying and that creature loses flying until end of turn.

editions.flavor: Even the lion envies the lark.

name: Burning Sands
text: Whenever a creature dies, that creature's controller sacrifices a land.

editions.flavor:
"Pain teaches lessons no scholar can."
—Kamahl, pit fighter

name: Burning Shield Askari
text:
Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)
{R}{R}: Burning Shield Askari gains first strike until end of turn.

editions.flavor:
"Any day that I ride my horse up to my ankles in the remains of my enemies is a good day."
—Akin, seasoned askari

name: Burning-Tree Bloodscale
text:
Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.)
{2}{R}: Target creature can't block Burning-Tree Bloodscale this turn.
{2}{G}: Target creature blocks Burning-Tree Bloodscale this turn if able.

name: Burning-Tree Emissary
text: When Burning-Tree Emissary enters the battlefield, add {R}{G} to your mana pool.

editions.flavor: Those who regard the Gruul as savage simpletons underestimate the subtle power of their shamans.

name: Burning-Tree Shaman
text: Whenever a player activates an ability that isn't a mana ability, Burning-Tree Shaman deals 1 damage to that player.

editions.flavor: Gruul shamans are bent on punishing the civilized. Any act more complex than rubbing sticks together or eating with utensils is met with the stinging burn of their magic.

name: Burning Vengeance
text: Whenever you cast a spell from your graveyard, Burning Vengeance deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

editions.flavor: Mist is the geists' sorrow. Wind is their pain. Fire is their vengeance.
Mist is the geists' sorrow. Wind is their pain. Fire is their vengeance.

name: Burning Wish
text: You may choose a sorcery card you own from outside the game, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Exile Burning Wish.

editions.flavor: She wished for a weapon, but not for the skill to wield it.
She wished for a weapon, but not for the skill to wield it.
She wished for a weapon, but not for the skill to wield it.

name: Burnished Hart
text: {3}, Sacrifice Burnished Hart: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

editions.flavor: Forged by divine hands to wander mortal realms.
Forged by divine hands to wander mortal realms.
Forged by divine hands to wander mortal realms.

name: Burnout
text:
Counter target instant spell if it's blue.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

editions.flavor:
"GOTCHA!"
—Jaya Ballard, task mage

"GOTCHA!"
—Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

name: Burn the Impure
text: Burn the Impure deals 3 damage to target creature. If that creature has infect, Burn the Impure deals 3 damage to that creature's controller.

editions.flavor: Flame doesn't kneel to Phyrexia.

name: Burnt Offering
text:
As an additional cost to cast Burnt Offering, sacrifice a creature.
Add X mana in any combination of {B} and/or {R} to your mana pool, where X is the sacrificed creature's converted mana cost.

editions.flavor:
"My foes serve me twice: in dying, and in death."
—Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

name: Burn Trail
text:
Burn Trail deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
Conspire (As you cast this spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it and you may choose a new target for the copy.)

name: Burrenton Bombardier
text:
Flying
Reinforce 2—{2}{W} ({2}{W}, Discard this card: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature.)

editions.flavor: The flasks provide ballast, a means of steering, and—with a little luck—a way to deliver ward-spells to cohorts below.
The flasks provide ballast, a means of steering, and—with a little luck—a way to deliver ward-spells to cohorts below.

name: Burrenton Forge-Tender
text:
Protection from red
Sacrifice Burrenton Forge-Tender: Prevent all damage a red source of your choice would deal this turn.

editions.flavor: "We are a clachan of smiths. The forge is as comfortable to us as a small fire during a cool winter's evening."
"We are a clachan of smiths. The forge is as comfortable to us as a small fire during a cool winter's evening."

name: Burrenton Shield-Bearers
text: Whenever Burrenton Shield-Bearers attacks, target creature gets +0/+3 until end of turn.

editions.flavor: Soul and bones, kithkin are woven into their clans. They fight fiercely and without self-interest.

name: Burr Grafter
text:
Sacrifice Burr Grafter: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
Soulshift 3 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

name: Burrowing
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has mountainwalk. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)

name: Bursting Beebles
text: Bursting Beebles is unblockable as long as defending player controls two or more nonland permanents that share an artist.

editions.flavor: Like thousands of others, the beebles quit Magic for several years following the release of the Mercadian Masques set.

name: Burst Lightning
text:
Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.)
Burst Lightning deals 2 damage to target creature or player. If Burst Lightning was kicked, it deals 4 damage to that creature or player instead.

name: Burst of Energy
text: Untap target permanent.

editions.flavor:
"I stand ready to die for our world. Who will stand with me?"
—Radiant, archangel

name: Burst of Speed
text: Creatures you control gain haste until end of turn. (They can attack and {T} even if they just came under your control.)

editions.flavor: Great generals inspire by example. Goblin chieftains inspire by electrifying the barracks.

name: Burst of Strength
text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature and untap it.

editions.flavor:
"Our fight is not about territory or revenge. It is about freedom, plain and simple."
—Ruric Thar, Ghor-Clan chieftain

name: Bushi Tenderfoot
text: When a creature dealt damage by Bushi Tenderfoot this turn dies, flip Bushi Tenderfoot.

name: Bust
text: Destroy all lands.

name: Butcher Ghoul
text: Undying (When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)

editions.flavor: Without a mind, it doesn't fear death. Without a soul, it doesn't mind killing.
Without a mind, it doesn't fear death. Without a soul, it doesn't mind killing.

name: Butcher of Malakir
text:
Flying
Whenever Butcher of Malakir or another creature you control dies, each opponent sacrifices a creature.

text:
Flying

text: You may assign Butcher Orgg's combat damage divided as you choose among defending player and/or any number of creatures he or she controls.

editions.flavor: It can kill you with three arms tied behind its back.

name: Butcher's Cleaver

editions.flavor: Outside the safety of Thraben, there is little distinction between tool and weapon.
Outside the safety of Thraben, there is little distinction between tool and weapon.

name: Butcher's Glee
text: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains lifelink until end of turn. Regenerate it. (Damage dealt by a creature with lifelink also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

editions.flavor: The Crave made Kneecleaver think she was bigger than the dragon.

name: Bygone Bishop
text:
Flying
Whenever you cast a creature spell with converted mana cost 3 or less, investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

name: Byway Courier
text: When Byway Courier dies, investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

editions.flavor: A good courier travels fast and asks no questions.

name: Cabal Archon
text: {B}, Sacrifice a Cleric: Target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

editions.flavor: "You are weak. I am strong. The protocol is obvious."

name: Cabal Coffers
text: {2}, {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool for each Swamp you control.

editions.flavor: Deep within the Cabal's vault, the Mirari pulsed like a dead sun-and its darkness radiated across Otaria.
Deep within the Cabal's vault, the Mirari pulsed like a dead sun—and its darkness radiated across Otaria.
Deep within the Cabal's vault, the Mirari pulsed like a dead sun—and its darkness radiated across Otaria.

name: Cabal Conditioning
text: Any number of target players each discard a number of cards equal to the highest converted mana cost among permanents you control.

editions.flavor:
"Hear only the Cabal's voice.
See only the Cabal's way.
Speak only the Cabal's word."
—Cabal mantra

name: Cabal Executioner
text:
Whenever Cabal Executioner deals combat damage to a player, that player sacrifices a creature.
Morph {3}{B}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

name: Cabal Inquisitor
text: Threshold — {1}{B}, {T}, Exile two cards from your graveyard: Target player discards a card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery, and only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

name: Cabal Interrogator
text: {X}{B}, {T}: Target player reveals X cards from his or her hand and you choose one of them. That player discards that card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

name: Cabal Patriarch
text:
{2}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
{2}{B}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

name: Cabal Pit
text:
{T}: Add {B} to your mana pool. Cabal Pit deals 1 damage to you.

name: Cabal Ritual
text:
Add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.

"Each syllable chills your veins. Each word rattles your mind."

"Each syllable chills your veins. Each word rattles your mind."

name: Cabal Shrine
text: Whenever a player casts a spell, that player discards X cards, where X is the number of cards in all graveyards with the same name as that spell.

name: Cabal Slaver
text: Whenever a Goblin deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.

editions.flavor: "In its natural habitat, the goblin is stupid, yet devious. Now it's stupid, devious, and powerful."

name: Cabal Surgeon
text: {2}{B}{B}, {T}, Exile two cards from your graveyard: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

editions.flavor: "Clerics give up when their patients die. Can I help it if I'm more compassionate?"

name: Cabal Therapy
text:

text: Bolster 3. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put three +1/+1 counters on it.)

editions.flavor: The glittering scales in the Abzan vaults represent mighty deeds of the past and protection for generations to come.

name: Cache Raiders
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, return a permanent you control to its owner's hand.

editions.flavor: What the current doesn't take, they do.
What the current doesn't take, they do.

Creatures you control of the chosen color get +1/+1.

name: Cagemail
text:
Enchant creature

—Commander Eesha

text:
Enchant creature

editions.flavor:
"Our own actions built the prisons that now hold us. Our hands reached too far and tried to hold too much."
—Dosan the Falling Leaf

name: Cairn Wanderer
text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
As long as a creature card with flying is in a graveyard, Cairn Wanderer has flying. The same is true for fear, first strike, double strike, deathtouch, haste, landwalk, lifelink, protection, reach, trample, shroud, and vigilance.

text:
Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

Flash

Caller of the Hunt's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures of the chosen type on the battlefield.

Myriad (Whenever this creature attacks, for each opponent other than defending player, you may create a token that's a copy of this creature that's tapped and attacking that player or a planeswalker he or she controls. Exile the tokens at end of combat.)

text:

text:

Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the sacrificed creature's power.

text: Create a 3/3 green Centaur creature token.

Enchant creature

name: Call of the Herd
text:

text:
Create a 1/1 blue and black Horror creature token with flying.
Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

name: Call of the Wild

text:

name: Callous Giant
text: If a source would deal 3 or less damage to Callous Giant, prevent that damage.

editions.flavor: "The invasion has awoken slumbering mountains," noted Urza. "Good. We can use all the help we can get."

name: Callous Oppressor
text:

{T}: Gain control of target creature that isn't of the chosen type for as long as Callous Oppressor remains tapped.

name: Callow Jushi
text:

At the beginning of the end step, if there are two or more ki counters on Callow Jushi, you may flip it.

name: Call the Bloodline
text: {1}, Discard a card: Create a 1/1 black Vampire Knight creature token with lifelink. Activate this ability only once each turn.

editions.flavor: At Sorin's appeal, Olivia Voldaren summoned the full might of her bloodline to gather at Lurenbraum Fortress.

name: Call the Gatewatch
text: Search your library for a planeswalker card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

editions.flavor:
"I've heard it said that a Planeswalker is someone who can always run from danger. But Gideon's right: we're also the ones who can choose to stay."
—Jace Beleren

name: Call the Scions
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Create two 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C} to your mana pool."

editions.flavor: Ulamog's progeny swarm the land, draining Zendikar's mana to feed the titan's insatiable hunger.
